channel.title: Game Showed me everyone else's choices
channel.description:
I got revived as a deathknight, but then disconnected. When I reconnected I could see everyone else's choices (ex. "You will have a guard watch over you tonight"), except all the text was in white as opposed to the usual yellow.
I even saw that "[2] _Name_ will assassinate 10 tonight", so I guarded him as a deathknight and killed the assassin, winning the game for the BD.
In addition to this I saw everyone else's choices, even the dead chat's predictions of who will die tomorrow.
This was my second game in the 1.0.11d1 patch, haven't seen it since
